summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sound Customization feature. All requested features are working correctly including 6 sound options, volume control, Test Sound button, and localStorage persistence. Demo mode and settings persistence also verified.
passed_tests: Sound Customization - Settings panel shows 'CUSTOMIZE SOUND' section when Audio Alarm is ON
Sound Customization - All 6 sound options visible: Classic Beep, Gentle Chime, Urgent Alert, Soft Ping, Mini Siren, Double Tap
Sound Customization - Volume slider shows percentage (70% observed, within 10-100% range)
Sound Customization - Clicking a sound option selects it (Classic Beep showed orange background selection)
Sound Customization - Test Sound button is present and clickable
Sound Customization - Selected sound persists after page reload (localStorage 'alertSound' working)
Sound Customization - Volume setting persists after page reload (localStorage 'alertVolume' working)
Demo Mode - Enable demo mode toggle works and speedometer functionality verified
Settings persistence - Theme, wake lock, weather alerts persist across reloads
Frontend basic load - Google Maps displays correctly with dark theme
Frontend basic load - Speedometer shows properly with digital display
UI navigation - Settings panel opens and closes correctly
Audio Alarm toggle - Works correctly and shows/hides sound customization section
Volume control - Slider displays valid percentage in 10-100% range
Sound selection UI - All 6 expected sound options are present and selectable
localStorage integration - alertSound and alertVolume values persist correctly
Page reload persistence - All sound settings maintain state after browser refresh
Onboarding skip functionality - Skip button works to bypass tutorial
Settings panel UI - All required sections visible and functional
